article_title: Mosaic CEO Expects Fertilizer Business to Improve
article_text:
Mosaic Co. said Tuesday that strengthening global demand for its fertilizers and rising prices for some products would help the company rebound from a 79% slide in fourth-quarter profit.

Mosaic, one of the world's largest fertilizer makers with $9 billion in annual sales, anticipates record global shipments of potash this year and said a run-up in the price of phosphate in recent months has improved prospects for the fertilizer...
